attributes.action: Harsher penalties for animal cruelty and animal murder.
attributes.additional_details: French bull dog dragged to her death found in Bootle Merseyside.
attributes.background: On the 17th June 2019 a dog was found dead in Bootle having been strapped to a car and dragged to her death this is heart breaking it is the act of someone capable of anything this poor dog can be remembered for making a difference for other animals.
